content.raw: Hey, i'm trying to fix it by replacing the lines that Thomas said but i don'y finf the directory, colud you help me with this? i look for a gazebo directory inside simulator_gazebo, but only found a ConstactSensors.hh in /simulator_gazebo/gazebo/gazebo/include/gazebo-1.0.2/gazebo/sensors/
